info: Rating, 5 stars,  · March 2024,  · Stayed over a week
rating_comment:
Md. Kawser was a brilliant host. Very helpful and kind. He checked in on me multiple times and tried his best to make my stay here perfect in every way possible. On my next visit, if the place is vacant I will most definitely give this place a priority to stay again.
Also a special thanks to the caretaker and his family, absoutely lovely people. I cannot thank them enough for everything they have done.
Thank you.
Until next time.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · April 2023,  · Stayed over a week
rating_comment:
We stayed at Md Kawser Hossain luxury apartment from March 26th to April 14.
Kawser gave us extensive information about the city, restaurants and places of interest. We've never experienced such attention to detail... It was so very lovely to feel so very welcomed.
Communication: Kawser responded to message enquiries promptly, offered helpful “tourist-related information “ the building caretaking, Russel is very helpful.
This Apartment and surrounding buildings are under renovation/construction. Which didn’t bother us much.
Nice furniture, good bed, clean, wifi, smart TV.
The apartment was very well equipped with kitchen utensils, fridge, washing machine and cooktop.
Cleanliness was exceptional. I highly recommendable this place. Thank you for everything Kawser. ——Neha

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · March 2023,  · Stayed about a week

rating_comment: Mr. Kawser ‘s place was awesome to live . We found everything what was in the list, just location was hard to find . But apartment was so convenient and clean. Caretaker Mr. Rassel was so friendly and helpful. It is nice place to stay. Thanks Mr. Kawser for your great hospitality.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · February 2023,  · Stayed about a week
rating_comment:
Mr. Kawser was an excellent host and proactive. He communicated through chat with instructions before my check in. Also I got quick reply whenever I needed despite his busy schedule.
The caretakers were really helpful as well for smooth check-in. The place was as nice as photos. All the guests we took there appreciated the duplex. It's worth of the money if you need a bigger place to stay. I highly recommend it to others.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · February 2023,  · Stayed over a week
rating_comment: This house is very Dreamy & Stylish. The Owners of the house Mr. Kawser and his Wife is very Well coming, Caring & Friendly. I was getting sick during the staying. Mr. Kawser actually find the Doctor for me. This People are truly beautiful by mind and soul. My Husband and I are now very confident about Air bnb. I am very thankful to our Host & Hostess for there sweet gesture.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · January 2023,  · Stayed over a week
rating_comment:
The owner has provided everything we could possibly require. It was exactly as described in the listing.The kitchen, Toilet and rest of the interiors were better equipped. Most importantly you certainly feel secure staying in this flat and you will appreciate the neighborhood as well.
Overall We felt so welcome and enjoyed our outing over there.
A big Thanks to Mr Kawser Hossain.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · December 2022,  · Stayed over a week
rating_comment: I and my family lived in Mr. Kawser's place for almost a month. Mr. Kawser is a great host! Communication was super awesome and he did almost everything to keep our stay smooth and comfortable. The interior is modern & beautiful! It is full of nice and modern amenities. The spacious living room and fully equipped kitchen gave us a nice experience staying at this place.
